assertions.assertion: An AIO control block structure aiocb is used in many asynchronous I/O functions. It is defined in <aio.h>
The AIO control block structure aiocb has following members: int aio_fildes off_t aio_offset volatile void* aio_buf size_t aio_nbytes int aio_reqprio struct sigevent aio_sigevent int aio_lio_opcode
The header <aio.h> shakk include following constants: AIO_ALLDONE AIO_CANCELED AIO_NOTCANCELED LIO_NOP LIO_NOWAIT LIO_READ LIO_WAIT LIO_WRITE
